name: Religious MIB vs Alien scientists v0.1
name_original: Religious MIB vs Alien scientists v0.1
description:
This game was made in 2 days (about 15 hrs of work) for "GDS Jam 2020", with theme "DISINFORMATION AND CONSPIRACY THEORIES" .

It was our first experience with Unity, so we did our best, but well, many bugs wasnt fixed on time.

How to play:
Aliens are trying to steal cows from villages. Spawn agents on the lines and defend villages!

Developers:
@ddarksidee &  @mustiian - Code, Logic
@legosky007 - Art, Animation, UI
